Title: Tech Evangelist
Writer: Josh Lieb, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Andrew Law (executive story editor), Rachele Lynn (executive story editor), Shawn Boxe (story editor), Meghan Pleticha (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, Josh Brener, Martin Starr, Kumail Nanjiani
Plot: Attempting to woo a gaming company to PiperNet, Richard inadvertently angers a prized ally; Dinesh deals with a betrayal; Gavin leaves his underlings with a cryptic message; Jared gets inside information from Big Head.
